TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 672
TEI.2.document_title: Columbus R Patton to Stephen F Austin, 07-12-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Columbus R. Patton to Austin, Hopkinsville, Ky., July 12, 1831. Intends to move to Texas with stock of goods and some negroes. Wants information. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 672

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Columbus R. Patton to Austin, Hopkinsville, Ky., July 12, 1831. Intends to move to Texas with stock of goods and some negroes. Wants information. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Hopkinsville, Ky.*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="07-12-1831">July 12,1831*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
